熺字的基本解释

熺
xī
放射：“明镫熺炎光。”
炽热：“熺炭重燔。”
古通“饎”，熟食：“湛熺必洁。”

熺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》許其切，平之，曉。］
同“熹1”。
通“饎”。炊之使熟。

熺字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　熺； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页681第22
【廣韻】【集韻】?同熹。【管子·侈靡篇】古之祭有時而星熺。【註】熺，星之明。或有祭明星者。　又同熾。炊也。【禮·月令】湛熾必潔。【淮南子·時則訓】作湛熺必潔。

熺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
熺字的起名意思

有放射，炽热的意思。

熺
Basic explanation of words
熺
xī
Radiation: "Inflammation of the stirrup."
Blazing: "The charcoal is heavy burnt."
Gutong "supplement", cooked food: "Zhanxi must be clean."

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" Xu Qiqie, Pingzhi, Xiao. ]
Same as "Xi 1".
Same as "饎". Cook the cook.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　熺; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 681 22
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Tongxi. [Guanzi·Exquisite articles] The ancient sacrifices are sometimes stark. [Note] Xi, Star of Ming. Or there are those who sacrifice to stars.　Tong Chi again. Cook also. 【Rite·Monthly Order】Clean and clean. [Huainanzi·Shi Zexun] Being a master must be clean.
